website_summaries.verdict: A quiet, professional-quality blender – perfect for the user who wants to prep breakfast smoothies without waking up the whole family.
pros: Pre-programmed settings make it easy to blend soups, drinks, and smoothies to perfection
Features a slider control for users to intuitively change the blending speed
Model is backed by an impressive 10-year warranty

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I really went out of my way to buy this. I needed something quiet in my house, so as to not wake everyone up. And yes it is quite, but to say I was disappointed when using this is an understatement. Did not blend without adding so much liquid to my smoothies, that they weren't really smoothies - just cold liquid. Anyhow, I would not recommend this unfortunately. I'm back to wearing my Bose noise cancelling headphones with my super loud but, good smoothie making Ninja.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what we have been looking for in a blender.
customer_reviews.text: We love this blender. I make raw nut butters with it with ease. The smoothies are so smooth! The juices are perfect and the soups are amazing. I will not go back to other blenders. We make smoothies several times per day. My Ninja IQ Blender did not last and the cost to replace is it not much different than what the cost is to purchase a new blender after calling the warranty department. We have gone through several Ninjas. We have never tried any of the Vitamix brands. We just absolutely love this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. A. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: 5 duds.
customer_reviews.text: We are on our 5th blender in 2 years. It keeps overheating or malfunctioning. Last time they tested it after we sent it back and it started smoking. Such a poor product. Wish I never bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product. It's one of the most versatile blenders ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. It's one of the most versatile blenders we've ever tried and we're just amazed with it's power and structure. Aside from being this amazing, you can buy the whole kit and, when you close the glass box, you won't hear a thing!!
customer_reviews.author: Caio Malufe

customer_reviews.title: Can't Hear This Beast Run!  WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: Best blender ever! Can't beat the quietness, functionality and performance. Highly recommend making an investment in one of these!
customer_reviews.author: ZC

customer_reviews.title: TOP NOTCH BLENDER
customer_reviews.text: DEFINITELY the CADILLAC of Blenders!! Not only is this Blender QUIET, it's built with QUALITY & SYLE! Had their lower model ($399.00) prior to purchasing their top-of-the-line for a couple of years, although a good blender, it was EXTREMELY NOISY!! This one you can actually carry on a conversation or be watching TV without any major disturbance! For sure, the "BEST OF THE BEST!!"
customer_reviews.author: VAM

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Lid started not to close just a few months after using it. I also started to get a "TOUCH ERROR" in big bold letters in the panel. Contacted Blendtec for warranty and haven't heard from them in more than a month. If you want to experience how bad their customer service is, just google "blendtec warranty" and click on the "Start my claim" button. The amount of steps you have to take to get warranty is ridiculous and the fact that they take weeks (4 weeks and counting) to contact you back shows how much they value your business. Buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: unisyean

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless you like to burn money for fun
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst investment I’ve ever made in terms of equipment. Don’t be fooled by the seemingly good reputation of Blendtec. This machine worked a total of 8 times, and then just wouldn’t turn on again. Neither Blendtec nor the company from whom I bought it won’t cover anything (it’s less than a month old) because I happen to live outside the imaginary borders of the US. Please don’t buy this machine, especially from this particular vendor: J.L. Hufford. I’ve never been this disappointed in a machine or company. I feel completely conned by both companies.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia Marie

customer_reviews.title: Quiet + effective = perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blender. Quiet enough to have a conversation over and powerful enough to blend to perfection. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Castle

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Like this very much and works great, however the price is still a lot at the end of the day it’s a blender and a cover
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I did my research and jumped to another brand and I am pretty disappointed. I would like my money back please
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender thinking that it would help with making smoothies and acai bowls faster and more consistent and not only that, but to reduce the sound effects that happen when blending drinks with a straight up Vitamix. I did my research and jumped to another brand and I am pretty disappointed. I would like my money back please. Basically my smoothies are runny and the Acai bowls never break down properly and chunks of frozen ingredients are left whole. It looks and seems like it should do a perfect job and yet every time I give it another chance I end up pretty annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bosschart

customer_reviews.title: ... noise is a little louder than I would have liked, I can still blend at midnight without waking ...
customer_reviews.text: While its noise is a little louder than I would have liked, I can still blend at midnight without waking the rest of the house up. As for the results, they're everything I was hoping it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Best blender evvver
customer_reviews.text: Loving this blender for everything. The fresh brocolli soup is omg delicous
customer_reviews.author: KKS

customer_reviews.title: it is super quiet
customer_reviews.text: it is super quiet i love it a little pricey BUT my neighbors are glad i bought it- so for that it is worth the $$$ my VitaMix was hurting their ears
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I would be lost without this thing. It's powerful. It's quiet. It liquified *EVERYTHING*. I'm one of those people who gets noticeably irked if there are fragments of kale in my shakes. No visible kale, no problem. The jar sometimes has a hard time blending things together if it's tightly packed or there's not enough water. This can be solved by stopping the blend cycle and pulsing it, but in an ideal product (which this should be at its point of sale) it would have a feedback mechanism to react to blockage. Blendtec's customer support is just ok.
customer_reviews.author: bryce_bryce

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: I was deployed on military orders supporting the fight against COVID-19, when I returned and try the product after the second use it started smoking from the back. I know the return widow has close but I would like some accommodation to exchange or return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of my new favorite kitchen tools! Used daily and just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat R.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I saw this at a smoothie bar and said I need one!!!!! I love it
customer_reviews.author: Dante Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Best blender without a doubt!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my coffee shop. It truly is silent and does not waist time with anything you need to make. Yes it is expensive but you'll make your money back quickly.
customer_reviews.author: CreativeArt Mexico

customer_reviews.title: This blender has a shelf life and it is not industructable
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender for so many reason, mostly because it’s so damn quite. However, I haven’t even owned this bad boy for too long and yesterday the jar broke open whilst I was attempting to blend frozen bananas and coconut milk! I have been blending frozen things in the his thing since I got it. No problem usually. So if you get this, I would recommend getting a warranty on it, so you’re not forced to buy a new jar separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best blender I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: For sure, the best blender I have ever had. Makes whatever you want and the final products (juices, soups, mix, etc.) are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: You will be happy you did
customer_reviews.text: If you can afford it, buy it, if not, save up. You will be happy you did!!!! Incredible machine and quiet as well.
customer_reviews.author: Frankenstein

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think twice just buy it you wouldn’t regret
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this blender and I must admit im very impressed by how quiet it really is Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: raynal

customer_reviews.title: Quiet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender!!!! It was expensive but well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Smith

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected and more. Quite, easy to use and easy to clean. Absolutely love it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best blender ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This blender is exactly what we have been looking for. Quiet, powerful and easy to use. Works great for smoothies and malts. It is really fast and fun to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The package of this one is different from the one ...
customer_reviews.text: The blender is faked!!!!!!!!!!!!The package of this one is different from the one I bought from Blendtec official website. The specification seems to be a photocopy. Is your products quality goods?
customer_reviews.author: Zhuang Tian

customer_reviews.title: the display not work and i look for the Service ...
customer_reviews.text: the display not work and i look for the Service Interruption We are currently experiencing systems issues due to an external interruption, support teams are working to restore services as quickly as possible. This is a service interruption issue which we are monitoring closely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything is watery.
customer_reviews.text: It blends. But just turns everything into water. I like banana with milk, ice and protein powder. I like it to be thick but with no lumps. There are no lumps with Blendtec, but the smoothie is not thick, but completely watery. I’ve been making this same smoothly every morning for five years with my old blender. I got the Blendtec and have stopped having morning smoothies because no matter what setting I use, I cannot get it to be anything but watery. Total disappointment. I wish I could send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Robin

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works better than any other blender
customer_reviews.text: This is my second BlendTec which I used for 8 years, and the motor is still running strong. This one is an upgrade, and is a very sturdy, well made machine. The hinged cover makes such a big difference in the noise level. I love it, and will always be a BlendTec fan. Due to the patented design of the blender container, no need for a tamp down stick like some other brands, it does a super effective job all by itself.
customer_reviews.author: chatting33

customer_reviews.title: Burned motor after 3 years of light use
customer_reviews.text: I loved the blender and how it made all kind of smoothies and hot soups, it was silent compare to other blender. But for a $1000 you would expect this blender to last like 10 years at least, right? Wrong! Mine started to smoke and it is a fire hazard now. I want my money back, not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Paola2015

customer_reviews.title: Best Quiet Blender and works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender. It is very quiet and blends really well. I bought an extra wideside jar which helps when making a lot of blended drinks. My kids use it to make post workout shakes. If you use a blender a lot I would recommend this one. It is a bit expensive but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mmightymite

customer_reviews.title: The quiet I needed
customer_reviews.text: The blade of this is not sharp, as one might think a blender needs to be, but it works very well. I had a very nice, very powerful Breville blender that I loved. However, it was so loud that I developed ringing in my ears so I had to stop using it. The Blendtec Professional 800 Blender makes my morning vegetable smoothie very well and does not produce the ringing in my ears. It is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Seeing Deeply

customer_reviews.title: works great for juices
customer_reviews.text: works great for juices. I make smoothies several times a day and sometimes, frozen fruits kinda stuck to its blades and does not blend. This only happens if i put too much ice in the unit, but can easily solved by putting a little more milk and shake it back and forth. i have not tried making smoothies with iphone, but i guess it will make a great iphone smoothies no doubt at all.
customer_reviews.author: Junghoon ji

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: The blender for the gotta have it all. Best blender period. Once you have one of these you won't be able to imagine life with a blender without a noise shield. Very powerful and can blend almost anything.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: this is very expensive but it is a quality machine. no problems
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon M. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Solved the ringing ear problem of our previous blender.
customer_reviews.text: Our old Blendtec blender was required for the soup setting, which allowed us to blend down particles enough to fit through a feeding tube for our daughter...but it would make me grit my teeth while it was running, and my ears would ring for about an hour afterward. This one cuts the noise down significantly -- it's still loud enough that you can't have a conversation next to it, but at least it doesn't trigger the physical reactions any more. It's also slightly big for our cabinets, so storage is a bit more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Guygrumpy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BEST BLENDER EVER
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING BEST BLENDER EVER. The touch screen is so cool. Only downside is I'm not sure you can customize the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey T

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful blender! We have used it many times from making baby food to soup to margaritas. A must have for any avid cook's kitchen; this is an extremely quiet and powerful blender.
customer_reviews.author: HppyPnda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! This is the best blender I have ever ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ! This is the best blender I have ever used. No noise no spilling. Best recommendation !
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: May be my best purchase EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This engages me with health like nothing else! Pure awesomeness!
customer_reviews.author: Nauset Dave

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: awful!! i sent it back! cannot compare to the vita-mix!
customer_reviews.author: onebearheart

product_meta.title: Blendtec Professional 800 Blender with WildSide+ Jar (90 oz), Sealed Sound Enclosure, Industries Strongest and Quietest Professional-Grade Power, 11-Speed Touch Slider, Self-Cleaning, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackLet’s talk about time for a moment, it’s the one thing in life that is given equally to everyone. Regardless of our circumstances, jobs, or family commitments we all have exactly 24 hours to use each day. Time is precious and fleeting. It will not wait for any of us to use it up or share with others. Cooking meals and cleaning dishes takes effort and a lot of time. Day-after-day meals need to be made, and then the cleanup begins. It’s a necessary part of life. Blendtec blenders significantly reduce meal prep time and cleanup. When you buy a Blendtec blender you’re not only buying the world’s most advanced blender, you’re also buying yourself more time. How can a blender give you more time? It comes down to technology and design. Our advanced technology and jar design create a vortex, which pulls food towards the blade instead of pushing it to the sides of the jar like our competitors. With Blendtec jars, you won’t waste time tending your blends with a tamper to get all the ingredients down into the blades, and no tamper means one less thing to clean when you’re done. Blendtec blenders can also heat your food during the blend cycle. For instance, if you want soup for dinner, a Blendtec blender can blend it up and heat it up at the same time so it’s ready to serve straight from the blender jar. No need to heat your soup in a pan. Can your old blender do that? No pan and no additional heating time means less cleanup. Not only can Blendtec blenders heat your food, they can also make ice cream. Actual ice cream can be made with the exact same blender that makes soup. Drinks, appetizers, main courses, and desserts can all be made with the same blender using the same jar. The time it takes to make each course could be measured in seconds not minutes or hours. Cleanup for an entire multi-course meal could be as simple as pushing the pre-programmed, self-cleaning button to wash a single jar, and just like that, you’ll be done. There is a reason that having the world's most technologically advanced blender is worth every penny, it gives you more time to focus on life and the people who matter to you.
feature_bullets: Blendtec blenders are built to the highest professional standards. Our blades are 80% thicker and 10x stronger than other blender blades. No tamper/plunger needed. Professional-grade countertop or in-counter professional blender with 1-touch timed and pre-programmed cycles for smoothies, shakes, soups, crushed ice, juicer, ice cream maker, mixer, and self-cleaning.

Six preprogrammed blend cycles + pulse for just about any recipe. Use specific cycles to make anything from smoothies and fresh whole juice to cappuccinos, soups, margaritas, bread dough, sauces, dressings, and much more. The Pro 800 is capable of achieving 3.8 peak horsepower under laboratory conditions.

The Professional 800 operates at 11 speeds. Touch slider offers ultimate precision speed control, by simply sliding finger up and down control panel. One-touch interface for easy cleaning and quick blending, with LCD countdown timer for consistent results each time.

Includes BPA-free and impact resistant WildSide+ jar with extra-wide base and narrow fifth "wild" side for a faster, smoother blend. The WildSide+ Jar is a 90 oz volume jar with 36 oz blending capacity (wet or dry). Blendtec Sound Enclosure makes quiet blending possible in the home and in high volume shops. Top and back portions completely cover blocking sound for high volume blends with low noise.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars118 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
